content.raw:
One thing done across all widgets is that the tooltip shows the name of the field in the message. For example, a field called `cast_shadows` will have a label `Cast shadows` and a tooltip `cast_shadows`. Not all widgets maintain the fields from the message though, pose for example displays "Roll" "Pitch" Yaw" instead of "x" "y" "z" "w".

But I agree, let's go with a nice tooltip since the way this widget is implemented, it could be used outside of the context of a protobuf message.
